# allquiet_team (Resource)

The team resource represents a team in All Quiet. Teams are used to group members and define schedules, its tiers and rorations.

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "allquiet_team" "my_team_with_weekend_rotation" {
  display_name = "My team with weekly weekend rotation"
  time_zone_id = "America/Los_Angeles"
  incident_engagement_report_settings = {
    day_of_week = "mon"
    time        = "09:00"
  }
  members = [
    {
      email = "cantor@acme.com"
      role  = "Administrator"
    },
    {
      email = "riemann@acme.com"
      role  = "Member"
    },
    {
      email = "galois@acme.com"
      role  = "Member"
    },
    {
      email = "gauss@acme.com"
      role  = "Member"
    },
    {
      email = "kolmogorov@acme.com"
      role  = "Member"
    }
  ]
  tiers = [
    {
      auto_escalation_after_minutes = 5
      schedules = [
        {
          schedule_settings = {
            start : "08:00"
            end : "20:00"
          }
          rotations = [
            {
              members = [
                {
                  email = "riemann@acme.com"
                },
                {
                  email = "galois@acme.com"
                },
                {
                  email = "gauss@acme.com"
                },
                {
                  email = "kolmogorov@acme.com"
                }
              ]
            }
          ]
        },
        {
          schedule_settings = {
            start : "20:00"
            end : "08:00"
          }
          rotation_settings = {
            repeats               = "weekly"
            starts_on_day_of_week = "sat"
          }
          rotations = [
            {
              members = [
                {
                  email = "riemann@acme.com"
                },
                {
                  email = "galois@acme.com"
                }
              ]
            },
            {
              members = [
                {
                  email = "gauss@acme.com"
                },
                {
                  email = "kolmogorov@acme.com"
                }
              ]
            }
          ]
        }
      ]
    }
  ]
}


resource "allquiet_team" "my_team_with_day_and_night_rotation" {
  display_name = "My team with day and night rotation"
  time_zone_id = "America/Los_Angeles"
  incident_engagement_report_settings = {
    day_of_week = "mon"
    time        = "09:00"
  }
  members = [
    {
      email = "cantor@acme.com"
      role  = "Administrator"
    },
    {
      email = "riemann@acme.com"
      role  = "Member"
    },
    {
      email = "galois@acme.com"
      role  = "Member"
    },
    {
      email = "gauss@acme.com"
      role  = "Member"
    },
    {
      email = "kolmogorov@acme.com"
      role  = "Member"
    }
  ]
  tiers = [
    {
      auto_escalation_after_minutes = 5
      schedules = [
        {
          schedule_settings = {
            selected_days = ["mon", "tue", "wed", "thu", "fri"]
          }
          rotations = [
            {
              members = [
                {
                  email = "riemann@acme.com"
                },
                {
                  email = "galois@acme.com"
                },
                {
                  email = "gauss@acme.com"
                },
                {
                  email = "kolmogorov@acme.com"
                }
              ]
            }
          ]
        },

        {
          schedule_settings = {
            selected_days = ["sat", "sun"]
          }
          rotation_settings = {
            repeats               = "weekly"
            starts_on_day_of_week = "sat"
          }
          rotations = [
            {
              members = [
                {
                  email = "riemann@acme.com"
                },
                {
                  email = "galois@acme.com"
                }
              ]
            },
            {
              members = [
                {
                  email = "gauss@acme.com"
                },
                {
                  email = "kolmogorov@acme.com"
                }
              ]
            }
          ]
        }
      ]
    }
  ]
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `display_name` (String) The display name of the team

### Optional

- `incident_engagement_report_settings` (Attributes) Settings when to send the incident report for the team (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--incident_engagement_report_settings))
- `members` (Attributes Set) (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--members))
- `tiers` (Attributes List) (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--tiers))
- `time_zone_id` (String) The timezone id, defaults to 'UTC' if not provided. Find all timezone ids [here](https://allquiet.app/api/public/v1/timezone)

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) Id

<a id="nestedatt--incident_engagement_report_settings"></a>
### Nested Schema for `incident_engagement_report_settings`

Required:

- `day_of_week` (String) Which day of the week to send the report
- `time` (String) Time of the day to send the report


<a id="nestedatt--members"></a>
### Nested Schema for `members`

Required:

- `email` (String) Email of the member
- `role` (String) Role of the member (either 'Member' or 'Administrator')


<a id="nestedatt--tiers"></a>
### Nested Schema for `tiers`

Required:

- `schedules` (Attributes List) (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--tiers--schedules))

Optional:

- `auto_escalation_after_minutes` (Number) After how many minutes the incident should be escalated to the next tier.

<a id="nestedatt--tiers--schedules"></a>
### Nested Schema for `tiers.schedules`

Required:

- `rotations` (Attributes List) (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--tiers--schedules--rotations))

Optional:

- `rotation_settings` (Attributes) Settings for the rotation (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--tiers--schedules--rotation_settings))
- `schedule_settings` (Attributes) Settings for the schedule (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--tiers--schedules--schedule_settings))

<a id="nestedatt--tiers--schedules--rotations"></a>
### Nested Schema for `tiers.schedules.rotations`

Required:

- `members` (Attributes List) (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--tiers--schedules--rotations--members))

<a id="nestedatt--tiers--schedules--rotations--members"></a>
### Nested Schema for `tiers.schedules.rotations.members`

Required:

- `email` (String) Email of the member



<a id="nestedatt--tiers--schedules--rotation_settings"></a>
### Nested Schema for `tiers.schedules.rotation_settings`

Required:

- `repeats` (String) The rotation will repeat on the given interval

Optional:

- `starts_on_date_of_month` (Number) If set, starts on date of the month. Needs to be set if 'repeats' is 'monthly'
- `starts_on_day_of_week` (String) Starts on day of the week. Needs to be set if 'repeats' is not 'monthly'


<a id="nestedatt--tiers--schedules--schedule_settings"></a>
### Nested Schema for `tiers.schedules.schedule_settings`

Optional:

- `end` (String) End time of the schedule
- `selected_days` (List of String) Selected days of the week
- `start` (String) Start time of the schedule
